resources.string:
This app sends Reddit updates to your Wear OS SmartWatch every 3 seconds. Set A custom RSS feed url like:

https://www.reddit.com/r/all/new/.rss

then tap start to view on the corresponding wear os app.

Tips: Setup A custom feed on reddit, paste it's url here and append "/new/.rss" to the end.
Also try the watch app with Always-On-Display enabled, if available.
You can now start the service.
